Dear Michael.
My failure to start heritrix is caused by some problem with =
the MANIFEST.MF
created by the jar program.
If I unzip heritrix-0.7.1.jar a=
nd then include the unzip directory in the
classpath in bin/heritrix
It wor=
ks fine.
Could it be, that maven here require some specific jar-functionali=
ty only
supported by some JVM's.

Regards

------

I have no explaination for why you'd get the below exception (Looks l=
ike
jetty trying to find main but it can't because not on classpath
accordi=
ng to URL classloader).

Do you get same error if no wrapper script?  ("% .=
/bin/heritrix
--selftest")?  Do you get same error if you use a built binar=
y?  Did the
build have any errors?

(I just tried a build.  I also used you=
r wrapper script successfully
going against SUN and IBM JVMs.)

St.Ack



S=
